attributes.action: Mr Banyard and Many others, the list being too great to replicate here
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To procure through the Prime Ministers good offices a charge of Corporate Manslaughter (as was previously done with the railways) against Mrs  S Shoesmith and her colleges from the London Borough of Hammersmith & Fulham, that they put aside Baby P's "Human Right To Life", in favor of the natural mothers right "to continue allowing her baby to be abused by herself and others as a natural consequence of that Authority's policies, which they purposefully put before the  child's Human Rights. 

Further the Prime Minister should make a Public Statement rejecting in its entirety the policies & values that led once again a small child being  terribly tortured to death

rejection.details:
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.

Your petition duplicates: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/BabyPEnquiry/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
